vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-builtin
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
Message memory msg = Message({
            Sender: _adr,
            Time: now,
            Val: _val,
            Data: _data
vulnerability_findings.message: LogFile.addMessage.msg (local variable @ patch_7.sol#65-70) shadows built-in symbol "msg"

solc-version

Detected issues with version pragma in patch_7.sol:
